DOC.brief_summary: - Primary objective : - To demonstrate 2-dose regimen ProQuad® rHA administer 3-month interval healthy child 11 month age time Dose 1 immunogenic healthy child 12 month age time Dose 1 . - To demonstrate 2-dose regimen ProQuad® rHA administer 3-month interval healthy child 9 month age time Dose 1 immunogenic healthy child 12 month age time Dose 1 . - To demonstrate 2-dose regimen ProQuad® rHA administer 3-month interval healthy child 11 month age 9 month age time Dose 1 well-tolerated compare child 12 month age time Dose 1 . - Secondary objective - To describe antibody titre measles , mumps , rubella varicella Day 42 follow Dose 1 Dose 2 ProQuad® rHA administer healthy child 9 month age . - To evaluate safety profile Dose 1 Dose 2 ProQuad® rHA administer healthy child 9 month age .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Study Immunogenicity Safety 2-dose Regimen ProQuad® Manufactured With rHA
